"grid-cols-1" : plans.length === 2 ? "grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2" : plans.length === 3 ? "grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3" : "grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4" return (
